text:
The link that looks like it should go to version 1.1.3 javadoc documentation on
the download page actually takes one to 1.2 alpha 7 documentation.  This would
be fine if the class that almost everyone uses hadn't changed it's name, but it
really confuses us newbies when there is a "Logger" class in 1.2 alpha 7, but in
the download from the same paragraph doesn't have this class.
Also, the Logger class does not have an @since 1.2 javadoc comment in it, so it
isn't even possible to tell from the documentation that this is a new feature.
creator: wayfarer3134@yahoo.com
ceki@apache.org
text: Thanks. Log4j 1.2 is now a release candidate. I fixed the @since problem.
